entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: implicit cast ValueTask<T> to ValueTask #67212
  • [API Proposal]: Provide optimized read-only collections #67209
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.Activity: Enumeration API [Iteration 2] #67207
    7.0.0
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory failing with "The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect." (works in SharpZipLib) #67201
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67199
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67197
  • Seemed the `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` is not necessary for .NET 6 + #67196
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd.SystemdHelpers.IsSystemdService does not work inside containers. #67203

Closed

  • CodeGen optimization for enums and explicit number checks #67204
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.Activity: Enumeration API #67072
    7.0.0
  • Make Linq, Dynamic and Expressions use the same coding style as the rest of corefx #16390
    Future
  • Reduce code duplication in expression compiler and interpreter #18278
    Future
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #58607
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few issues with merged wrappers uncovered by local testing #67211
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add some documentation on `GT_CAST`'s semantics #67208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing side effect flags on HWI nodes #67206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port SequenceEqual to crossplat Vectors, optimize vector compare on x64 #67202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventLog` #67200
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml (DRAFT) #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Improve AOT time by better utilizing the cores #67195
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1684571 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleaned up code #66981
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml` #67178
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
